Subject: Weekly State of the Market - Agricultural Commodities (2025-09-16)

Softs, Dairy & Industrial

Executive Summary

The Commitments of Traders (COT) data for Agricultural Commodities reveals a mixed, yet actionable, market sentiment. Speculative bullish conviction persists in several softs and dairy products, with some reaching extreme levels. Conversely, certain biofuel and industrial commodities exhibit shifting or weakening bullish stances.

Key Opportunities

  • Cotton Sustained Bullish Momentum: Speculators are increasing net-longs, indicating strong and growing conviction for upward price action.
  • Orange Juice Sustained Bullish Momentum: Speculators are increasing net-longs, indicating strong and growing conviction for upward price action.
  • Coffee Short-Covering Rally: Significant speculative net-short positioning, coupled with a reduction in bearish bets, sets the stage for a sharp short squeeze.

Key Risks

  • Sugar Long Exhaustion Risk: Speculative net-long positions (26.7%) signal vulnerability to profit-taking and sharp corrections.
  • Ethanol Extreme Bearish Positioning: Speculators hold extreme net-short positions (-12.4%), which could lead to violent short-covering rallies.
  • Lumber Extreme Bearish Positioning: Speculators hold extreme net-short positions (-36.1%), which could lead to violent short-covering rallies.

Asset Class Summaries

Cocoa

  • Speculators:Dominantly bearish (net 849 contracts). Net-longs down 818 WoW.
  • Commercials:Net bullish (net 23812 contracts). Net-longs up 2289 WoW.
  • Implication:Sentiment is mixed; market lacks strong directional conviction.

Coffee

  • Speculators:Dominantly bearish (net 17180 contracts). Net-longs up 17180 WoW.
  • Commercials:Net bearish (net 35320 contracts). Net-longs down 35320 WoW.
  • Implication:Extreme speculative bearishness suggests potential for a strong short-covering rally.

Sugar

  • Speculators:Dominantly bullish (net 245338 contracts). Net-longs up 22320 WoW.
  • Commercials:Net bearish (net 301539 contracts). Net-longs down 342513 WoW.
  • Implication:Extreme speculative long positioning suggests high risk of correction.

Cotton

  • Speculators:Dominantly bullish (net 17359 contracts). Net-longs up 17359 WoW.
  • Commercials:Net bearish (net 11244 contracts). Net-longs down 11244 WoW.
  • Implication:Sustained speculative buying indicates continued bullish momentum.

Orange Juice

  • Speculators:Dominantly bullish (net 2276 contracts). Net-longs up 2276 WoW.
  • Commercials:Net bearish (net 3249 contracts). Net-longs down 2102 WoW.
  • Implication:Sustained speculative buying indicates continued bullish momentum.

Lumber

  • Speculators:Dominantly bearish (net 2378 contracts). Net-longs up 2378 WoW.
  • Commercials:Net bullish (net 2378 contracts). Net-longs up 5276 WoW.
  • Implication:Extreme speculative short positioning signals potential for short squeeze.

Ethanol

  • Speculators:Dominantly bearish (net 6948 contracts). Net-longs down 12405 WoW.
  • Commercials:Net bullish (net 36317 contracts). Net-longs up 36317 WoW.
  • Implication:Extreme speculative short positioning signals potential for short squeeze.

Dairy

  • Speculators:Dominantly bullish (net 1373 contracts). Net-longs down 1373 WoW.
  • Commercials:Net bullish (net 26114 contracts). Net-longs up 11730 WoW.
  • Implication:Mixed sentiment; market lacks strong directional conviction.
